Twitch.https_port: the port you choose to open to receive notifications from twitch
Twitch.broadcaster_id: the ID of your twitch user (int)
Twitch.channelname: the name of your twitch channel

whitelist: a list of users that can run commands with elevated priviledges

WebModules.http_port: a free port to use for webmodules. no need to open the port, it's local
